justification: “One of the most prominent instruments in this area, the Domain Specific Risk-Taking Scale (DOSPERT)… asks people to rate their propensity of committing each of the behaviors in the scale.”

topic_or_construct: Big Five personality traits (extraversion, agreeableness, conscientiousness, neuroticism, openness)
measured_by: 10-item short version of the Big Five Inventory (BFI-10)
justification: “Participants completed a Big Five personality inventory… The inventory consisted of 10 items that were rated on a 5-point Likert scale (Rammstedt & John, 2007).”
